response.overview: Rong Geng was born in a family of calligraphy and eunuchs in Dongguan in the late Qing Dynasty. He was a pioneer in the field of ancient philology in our country. This documentary adopts the shooting method of combining biography and current reality, closely follows the theme of "home and country in the half-life collection", and tells the feelings of Rong Geng's family and country through the perspective of Mr. Rong Geng's descendants.
response.title: Meet My Great-Grandpa
